constantValues: A specific item in a queue, such as a case record or an activity record.

members.name: queueItemId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the queue item.

members.description: Unique identifier of the queue item.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the queue that the item is assigned to.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the queue that the item is assigned to.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the activity, case, or article assigned to the queue.

constantValues: The name of the entity linked by objectId

members.name: objectTypeCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Select the type of the queue item, such as activity, case, or appointment.

members.description: Select the type of the queue item, such as activity, case, or appointment.

members.name: title

constantValues: Shows the title or name that describes the queue record. This value is copied from the record that was assigned to the queue.

members.description: Shows the title or name that describes the queue record. This value is copied from the record that was assigned to the queue.

members.name: enteredOn

constantValues: Shows the date the record was assigned to the queue.

members.description: Shows the date the record was assigned to the queue.

members.name: priority
members.description: Priority of the queue item.

members.name: state
members.description: Status of the queue item.

members.name: status

constantValues: Reason for the status of the queue item.

members.description: Reason for the status of the queue item.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Shows who last updated the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows who last updated the record.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.name: toRecipients

constantValues: Recipients listed on the To line of the message for email queue items.

members.description: Recipients listed on the To line of the message for email queue items.

members.name: sender

constantValues: Sender who created the queue item.

members.description: Sender who created the queue item.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the organization with which the queue item is associated.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the organization with which the queue item is associated.

members.name: versionNumber

constantValues: Version number of the queue item.

members.description: Version number of the queue item.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: workerIdModifiedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the queue item was last assigned to a user.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the queue item was last assigned to a user.

members.name: owningUser

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who owns the queue item.

members.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the queue item.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows whether the queue record is active or inactive. Inactive queue records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

constantValues: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

definitions.description: A specific item in a queue, such as a case record or an activity record.
